text: On Oct. 3, “ Mean Girls ” cast members set up a GoFundMe for Las Vegas shooting victims. Mean Girls Day typically honors the comedy classic ’ s legacy with memes and movies quotes, but this year Amanda Seyfried, Lacey Chabert, Jonathan Bennett, and Daniel Franzese made a video urging fans to donate to their “ Mean Girls for Las Vegas ” campaign. The initiative will raise money for victims of Sunday might ’ s attack, which left at least 59 dead and over 500 injured. “ We know today is a special day. And that ’ s because of fans like you, ” the video starts. “ This year though, we ’ re doing things a little differently. We want to turn the attention to those who need it. ” In the video, they asked for $ 3 donations in honor
